name: 레모네이드의 패키지 대표썸네일 탬플릿 | Package Thumbnail Master file
description:
팀 레모네이드에서 사용하는 패키지 썸네일의 일괄 규격입니다.


This is for the package thumbnail design in Team Lemonade. In order to reduce the repetitive work, we use the formats and manage them efficiently. 


Not only designers but also marketers and service managers can modify the file and enrol the images.
